house_listing.house_description: Excellent location for people on the move! Yet in a very quite and cozy area. Paint 1 yr, heat pump and central air 2 years. Cherry wood pargo floor seller neg on closing cost.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
